author: Norton Bonaparte
text: I have been approached about issuing an RFP for a full comprehensive scope of work to outsource an economic development program including things such as incentive management, marketing, new business attraction, strategic planning, business park development and management, small/minority business development and business retention/expansion.   Please share with me if you have issued such an RFP and what your experience has been.
title: RFP for an economic development program
